name: EmpowerRD
slogan: Smarter R&D claims for UK companies
description: We’ve developed a unique platform that generates intelligent feedback on your claim as it is written, meaning that our advisors can focus on the most important work, like maximising your claim value, and giving specialist feedback on the report once it’s been generated.

jobs.title: Sales Development Representative
jobs.description:
We are looking for an enthusiastic, motivated and driven person to join our growing sales team. In this role, your focus will be to connect with prospects across phone, email, social in order to generate opportunities for our Business Development Executives. We will provide training and support to grow into a senior sales role. 

Responsibilities
Generate new, high-quality sales meetings to be completed by BDEs
Meet all key performance metrics and goals on a weekly and monthly basis
Handle website enquiries
Learn about the R&D claim industry: competitors, landscape, etc.
Learn EmpowerRD services and demonstrate their value to prospective customers
Gain proficiency with our sales tools and CRM system

Qualifications
University degree or equivalent
0-1 year sales experience
Strong written and verbal communication skills and the ability to simplify topics.
Start-up mentality: self-starter, proactive, flexible.
Ability to be coached and trained with an ambition to learn and develop
Competitive who thrives in a target driven environment
Willingness to learn core technology tools.
Interest in pursuing a career in sales;
The ability to work autonomously as well as part of a team
Any experience in a Sales Role or interest in finance would be preferred (Retail,
Account Management, Sales)
